mdRecord.dcterms:title: Circle of Power/Matt X
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Self-taught artist Hugo Sperger was born in Italy and afterwards his family resettles in upstate New York. After a stint in the U. S. Army, Sperger lived in rural Kentucky. A prolific artist, Sperger created hundreds of paintings for over 40 years. Focusing on biblical scenes, his work gained attention after his death and was subsequently included in several exhibitions.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Virginia
Art
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
